value:
I'm so glad everyone here seems
nice. It's always uncertain when
you come to a new place.

In the Shepherds, I spent my time
taking care of horses and fighting
ruffians. I miss the routine of it...

You seem well right now, but if you
start to get sick, let me know—I know
all kinds of recipes for tonics.

Say, do you want to get something
to eat sometime? I want to try the
best foods this kingdom can offer!

I tried to fix my hair—does it look
OK? Once a Risen attacked me,
thinking I looked like a vegetable...

Ah, I finally found you. A friend sends
sincere regards. Who, you say? It
was $Nf!

Amazing! I can hardly believe
I'm still me!
Yes! Progress!
Sorry. I'll try to do better...

Thanks for the edge—I'd better get
in some practice!

H-hi, I'm Stahl, of the Shepherds.
Sorry—can't tell if my stomachache
is nerves or my three lunches!

Whew, good training session! Must
be time to find a sna— Oh, hey,
$Nu!$k$pAwww! You brought me a sandwich!
I was just about to grab something
to eat! Thanks!$k$pYou're always looking out for me.
I can't even count how many times
you've saved me on the battlefield!$k$pBut I've noticed that people who
take care of others sometimes
forget to take care of themselves.$k$pThat's why I'm keeping my eye on
you! Don't push yourself too hard,
and I'll do my best to support you.
はっ！
せやあっ！
うわっ！
Noooo...!
I love this part.
Get ready.
Let's do this!
Got a good feeling about this!
Got me good...
Heehee
Hey, thanks for coming by to chat!
I'm a proud member of the Shepherds. We help people.
Why are you star— Is my hair sticking up again?
If I train hard enough, maybe someday I can match the legendary Panther.
My father was an apothecary—I learned a thing or two about medicine from him.
M-my stomach hurts—I think I ate too much again...
I can be a bit of a fool for food, but I'll work hard for you.
Mm-hm.
Let's go.
Got it.
